product_name: REI Sahara Cargo Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: Lightweight men's REI Sahara Cargo Pants with 30 in. inseam offer plenty of comfort, coverage and storage for trail essentials. Lightweight nylon fabric packs small, dries fast and has a durable water repellent finish. UPF 50+ rating provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Loaded with pockets for essentials, including many with secure zip closures and/or secure rip-and-stick closures. Center gusset and elastic in back waist ease movement; soft waistband liner and flat seams increase comfort. Reinforced cuff backs stand up to abrasion from boots. Men's REI Sahara Cargo Pants with 30 in. inseam have a relaxed fit that generously allows for comfort and movement.
short_description: Lightweight men's REI Sahara Cargo Pants with 30 in. inseam offer plenty of comfort, coverage and storage for trail essentials.
